text: Blowoff or Blow(ing) off may refer to: * Blowoff valve * Blow-off panel, areas with intentionally weakened structure, are used in enclosures, buildings or vehicles where a sudden overpressure may occur * Blowoff, a dance event created by musicians Richard Morel and Bob Mould * A type of extra sideshow act * A type of clown act * Hydrodynamic escape * Blowing off, slang for fellatio * Blow off, in glossary of professional wrestling terms, the final match in a wrestling feud ==See also== * Blow (disambiguation) * Blowout (disambiguation)
title: Blow off
